title: The Favorites - July NFL Mailbag
itunes:title: The Favorites - July NFL Mailbag
description:
Baker Mayfield is now a Carolina Panther, and NFL questions have been streaming in for Action Network Chief Content Officer Chad Millman and his pro gambler co-host Simon Hunter. So together they wade through questions about the Panthers prospects in the NFC South, MVP longshots, Patrick Mahomes as a poker player, the worst stadium name in the NFL and so much more. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
